content: I am trying to use some results about IsDiscreteValuationRing in Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry. These results are contained in Mathlib.RingTheory.Valuation.Discrete.Basic. However it seems that Mathlib.RingTheory.Valuation.Discrete.Basic imports some file from Mathlib.Analysis and this is not allowed by the linter (as a cross-directory import). How best to fix this issue? I can think of either moving the results about IsDiscreteValuationRing to another file (but I am not sure if these results actually do require Mathlib.Analysis), or adding this as an exception to overrideAllowedImportDirs, but I am not sure what is the 'right' way to address this.
Edit: it turns out that in this case, RingTheory.Valuation.Discrete.Basic doesn't actually require Analysis - everything still works even with that specific import removed.
That's probably the best outcome - please pr :)
